subject: Hockey, Ice
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Rick Tocchet spent nearly 3,000 minutes in the penalty box during a 17-year career as a hard-nosed N.H.L. forward. On Thursday, he will return from the toughest penalty of his career — a two-year suspension imposed by the league for his involvement in a New Jersey betting ring.
